- (NSNumber *) desiredCapacity [read, write, retain]

The number of instances you prefer to maintain in your Auto Scaling group.

The desired capacity must be no less than ScheduledUpdateGroupAction$MinSize and no greater than ScheduledUpdateGroupAction$MaxSize.

- (NSString *) scheduledActionARN [read, write, retain]

The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this scheduled action.

The name of this scheduled action.

Constraints:

Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSDate *) time [read, write, retain]

The time that the action is scheduled to occur.

This value can be up to one month in the future.
